table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:0px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:8px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Entering enclosed spaces during operation can cause serious injury or death.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:8px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Turn OFF the main power before opening door.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:47px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Carelessness when removing workpiece can cause serious injury.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:47px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Machined edges are sharp and can cut.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:47px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Exercise extreme care when removing workpiece.
Ensure that tool holder is orientated properly before inserting into tool pot.
Orientation notch should be as shown.
